node.title: Rashida Tlaib Tears Up Calling for Boebert to Be Punished: 'We Shouldn't Have to Beg'
node.alt: Rep. Rashida Tlaib teared up Wednesday while calling for action to be taken against Rep. Lauren Boebert over anti-Muslim remarks. In this photo, Tlaib talks during a hearing on Capitol Hill October 23, 2019/
node.description: A resolution was introduced Wednesday to strip Lauren Boebert of her committee assignments over her anti-Muslim remarks.
node.content:
["Representative Rashida Tlaib choked up Wednesday when calling for punitive action against Lauren Boebert over her anti-Muslim remarks.", "Tlaib was one of a dozen House Democrats to back a resolution to remove the Colorado congresswoman from the House Budget and House Natural Resources committees. The measure was introduced Wednesday by Representative Ayanna Pressley.", "\"We shouldn't have to beg and urge Republicans to do what's right here,\" Tlaib said during the press conference. \"They have Muslims in their communities, I know they do.\"", "The Michigan Democrat added, \"It is hard. It is hard being Muslim in our country right now, and this makes it worse. Let me tell you, it's important for us to understand this is a national platform that we cannot allow her to use to evoke hate.\"", "Boebert has been under fire for the past two weeks for making Islamophobic comments aimed at Minnesota Democrat Ilhan Omar, describing her as a member of the \"Jihad Squad\" and suggesting she could have been a terrorist.", "Tlaib and Omar were the first Muslim women ever elected to Congress.", "This is a developing story and will be updated with more information as it becomes available.", "", "
